text:
We found a couple of memory leaks in APR when running an application that uses CMS. Our environment: 
apr 1.4.2, apr-util 1.3.9, apr iconv 1.2.1, Windows xp service pack 3, ActiveMQ broker 5.3.1, ActiveMQcpp 3.2.3, 

Attached please find an error report that we got from Devpartner error detection (please search for libapr-1.dll to find the leaks related to apr). I am also attaching a screenshot.

I am wondering if you can please fix them in the 1.4.2 branch. Thanks a lot for your help!

Helen
creator: huanghehe@yahoo.com
huanghehe@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 26205
Please find the infomation about the memory leaks in apr from the attached screen shot

creator: huanghehe@yahoo.com
text: Just found out the error report in xml is too large to attach. I think we can skip it because the screenshot should have the same informtion. Thanks!

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
There's no information in that screenshot that would indicate a leak: it looks more likely to be your tool reporting expected pool behaviour.

If you have more information that leads you to suppose there's a leak, please tell us, either here or by posting to the dev list.
